subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Last season the N.H.L. reaped its first real crop of superstars in years, but first among equals is Evgeni Malkin of the Pittsburgh Penguins, a lanky 20-year-old forward from Russia.
snippet: Last season the N.H.L. reaped its first real crop of superstars in years, but first among equals is Evgeni Malkin of the Pittsburgh Penguins, a lanky 20-year-old forward from Russia.
